Novo Nordisk A/S

Novo Nordisk A/S is a global manufacturer of medicines for the treatment of chronic diseases with its headquaters in Bagsværd, Denmark. Since its founding in 1923, the company has developed into one of the world's leading insulin manufacturers. In 2023 it became Europe's most valuable company. Novo Nordiskʼs IT department DD&IT focuses on how technology can revolutionise drug development and improve the quality of healthcare.

Visit Novo Nordiskʼs website

In my role as Student Assistant for Novo Nordisk, I work as a UX Designer and Researcher in a software project for operators in the factories. In this role I'm a part of the DD&IT department. My team, guided by the double diamond and a user-centric approach, works in an advisory capacity for software projects in the area of product supply. My tasks include:

  • UX and UI design of a mobile app, including prototyping with Figma
  • Planning and facilitating remote and in person user research
  • Close collaboration with UX designers, frontend developers and other SCRUM roles
  • Planning and facilitating ideation workshops guided by design thinking
